description:
Single host dhcp VM's are not able to connect via dhcp.  This causes devstack to fail, as the VM is unable to process a dhcp response from dnsmasq.  This is a known problem as the dhcp response does not contain a checksum which causes the VM included in devstack to fail.

There is a workaround in nova but is applied only to multi-host setups.  A patch to fix this problem has been submitted at

	
Change I53e7e285: remove multi_host check for dhcp checksum
title: single host vm's are not able to connect via dhcp
